00076     virtual void add(unsigned int v, unsigned int w, double amount);
00077     virtual void evaporate(unsigned int v, unsigned int w);
00078     void evaporate_all();

00081 };

00128 class OptimizationProblem {
00129   public:
00131     virtual unsigned int get_max_tour_size() = 0;
00133     virtual unsigned int number_of_vertices() = 0;
00135     virtual std::map<unsigned int,double> get_feasible_start_vertices() = 0;
00137     virtual std::map<unsigned int,double> get_feasible_neighbours(unsigned int vertex) = 0;
00139     virtual double eval_tour(const std::vector<unsigned int> &tour) = 0;
00141     virtual double pheromone_update(unsigned int v, double tour_length) = 0;
00143     virtual void added_vertex_to_tour(unsigned int vertex) = 0;
00145     virtual bool is_tour_complete(const std::vector<unsigned int> &tour) = 0;
00147     virtual std::vector<unsigned int> apply_local_search(const std::vector<unsigned int> &tour) { return tour; }
00149     virtual void cleanup() = 0;
00150 };

00161     unsigned int current_vertex();

00163   public:
00164     Ant(unsigned int vertices);
00165     Ant(const Ant &ant);
00166     Ant &operator=(const Ant &ant);
00167     bool operator<(const Ant &ant);
00168     ~Ant();
00169     double get_tour_length();
00170     std::vector<unsigned int> get_vertices();
00171     void reset();
00172     void apply_local_search(OptimizationProblem &op);
00173     virtual void construct_solution(OptimizationProblem &op, PheromoneMatrix &pheromones, double alpha, double beta) {}
00174     void construct_rational_solution(OptimizationProblem &op, PheromoneMatrix &pheromones, double alpha, double beta);
00175     void construct_random_proportional_solution(OptimizationProblem &op, PheromoneMatrix &pheromones, double alpha, double beta);

00201 enum LocalSearchType { NONE, ITERATION_BEST, ALL };

00276 template<class T=Ant, class P=PheromoneMatrix> class AntColony {
00277   private:
00278     void construct_ants_solutions() {
00279       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00280         T &ant = (*it);
00281         ant.construct_solution(*problem_, *pheromones_, alpha_, beta_);
00282       }
00283     }
00284 
00285     void apply_local_search() {
00286       ants_->sort();
00287       if(local_search_ == ITERATION_BEST) {
00288         typename std::list<T>::iterator it_best = ants_->begin();
00289         (*it_best).apply_local_search(*problem_);
00290       } else if(local_search_ == ALL) {
00291         for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00292           T &ant = (*it);
00293           ant.apply_local_search(*problem_);
00294         }
00295       }
00296     }
00297 
00298     void reset_ants() {
00299       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00300         it->reset();
00301       }
00302     }
00303 
00304     void update_best_tours_no_ls() {
00305       ants_->sort();
00306       (*best_iteration_no_ls_) = ants_->front();
00307       if(best_so_far_no_ls_->get_tour_length() > best_iteration_no_ls_->get_tour_length()) {
00308         (*best_so_far_no_ls_) = (*best_iteration_no_ls_);
00309       }
00310     }
00311 
00312     void update_best_tours() {
00313       ants_->sort();
00314       (*best_iteration_) = ants_->front();
00315       if(best_so_far_->get_tour_length() > best_iteration_->get_tour_length()) {
00316         (*best_so_far_) = (*best_iteration_);
00317       }
00318     }
00319 
00320     void update_stagnation_measure() {
00321       double average = 0.0;
00322       double standard_deviation = 0.0;
00323       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00324         average += it->get_tour_length();
00325       }
00326       average = average / ants_->size();
00327 
00328       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00329         standard_deviation += pow(it->get_tour_length() - average, 2);
00330       }
00331       standard_deviation *= 1.0 / ants_->size();
00332       standard_deviation = sqrt(standard_deviation);
00333       stagnation_measure_ = standard_deviation / average;
00334     }
00335 
00336     virtual void update_pheromones() = 0;
00337   protected:
00338     P *pheromones_;
00339     double alpha_;
00340     double beta_;
00341     bool compute_stagnation_measure_;
00342     LocalSearchType local_search_;
00343     double stagnation_measure_;
00344     std::list<T> *ants_;
00345     OptimizationProblem *problem_;
00346     T *best_so_far_;
00347     T *best_iteration_;
00348     T *best_so_far_no_ls_;
00349     T *best_iteration_no_ls_;
00350 
00351   public:
00352     AntColony(OptimizationProblem *problem, const AntColonyConfiguration &config) {
00353       problem_ = problem;
00354       ants_ = new std::list<T>(config.number_of_ants, T(problem->get_max_tour_size()));
00355       pheromones_ = new P(problem->number_of_vertices()+1, config.evaporation_rate, config.initial_pheromone);
00356       alpha_ = config.alpha;
00357       beta_ = config.beta;
00358       compute_stagnation_measure_ = config.stagnation_measure;
00359       local_search_ = config.local_search;
00360       stagnation_measure_ = 0.0;
00361       best_so_far_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00362       best_iteration_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00363       best_so_far_no_ls_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00364       best_iteration_no_ls_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00365     }
00366 
00367     ~AntColony() {
00368       delete problem_;
00369       delete ants_;
00370       delete pheromones_;
00371       delete best_so_far_;
00372       delete best_iteration_;
00373       delete best_so_far_no_ls_;
00374       delete best_iteration_no_ls_;
00375     };
00376 
00377     void run() {
00378       construct_ants_solutions();
00379       update_best_tours_no_ls();
00380       apply_local_search();
00381       update_best_tours();
00382       if(compute_stagnation_measure_) {
00383         update_stagnation_measure();
00384       }
00385       update_pheromones();
00386       reset_ants();
00387     }
00388 
00389     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour() {
00390       return best_so_far_->get_vertices();
00391     }
00392 
00393     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_in_iteration() {
00394       return best_iteration_->get_vertices();
00395     }
00396 
00397     double get_best_tour_length() {
00398       return best_so_far_->get_tour_length();
00399     }
00400 
00401     double get_best_tour_length_in_iteration() {
00402       return best_iteration_->get_tour_length();
00403     }
00404 
00405     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_no_ls() {
00406       return best_so_far_no_ls_->get_vertices();
00407     }
00408 
00409     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_in_iteration_no_ls() {
00410       return best_iteration_no_ls_->get_vertices();
00411     }
00412 
00413     double get_best_tour_length_no_ls() {
00414       return best_so_far_no_ls_->get_tour_length();
00415     }
00416 
00417     double get_best_tour_length_in_iteration_no_ls() {
00418       return best_iteration_no_ls_->get_tour_length();
00419     }
00420 
00421     double get_stagnation_measure() {
00422       return stagnation_measure_;
00423     }
00424 };
